article.title: Boeing Receives Military Satellite Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Boeing Satellite Systems Incorporated, El Segundo, California, was awarded a $6 million contract modification of the Wideband Global Satellite Communication Block II contract in support of the Military Satellite Communications Program. This mission assurance task order will provide additional on-ground testing while the SV4 spacecraft is in thermal vacuum. At this time, the entire amount has been obligated.
